alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A CLUSTER OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WAYNE AND SUSQUEHANNA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A cluster of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 401 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was over Lanesboro, or 9 miles southwest of Deposit moving southeast at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Honesdale, Damascus, Jackson, Susquehanna, Forest City, Susquehanna Depot, Waymart, Hallstead, New Milford, and Ararat. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 223. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Though roads are generally warm and wet, which will resist accumulation, visibility may rapidly drop to below a quarter mile. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
